name: Fight of Faith
description:
In this game, the devil is out to fight against your faith. You must fight back the devil. You must jump and hit the head of the devils to kill them. For the bible says, God has put the devil under your feet. Each devils you kill, vomit every coins of blessings they have taken from you. You are expected to collect all your coins of blessings, with a high score before getting to the last level. In this game there are four levels. You must fight to the last level to win your crown.

HOW TO PLAY THE GAME

Press the jump control button, to go up above the devils.

Press the Red arrow button to move backward.

Press the green arrow button to move forward.
